FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Q. How long does it take for my account to be activated?
A. Your ordered product will be automatically and instantly activated (subject to fraud screening).

Q. Do you have an uptime guarantee?
A. We offer a 99.99% uptime guarantee across all of our plans, if we fall short of this in any 14 day period you’ll be credited with free time on request.

Q. What kind of backups do you have in place?
A. Each account comes with daily backups with a retention period of 14 days, you can restore individual files, databases and email accounts within your myFYR.

Q. Which payment methods do you accept?
A. We accept Credit/Debit card and PayPal. Cards include Amex, VISA, MasterCard and Discovery.

Q. Do you offer a money back guarantee?
A. Yes, we offer a full 14 days no questions asked money back guarantee. If you decide that you’re unhappy or that we’re just not a fit we’ll refund you in full within the first 14 days.

*To activate your FREE cPanel license open a ticket to our sales team.
